p: Accused persons have, to date, been reluctant to exercise this right. See Adam Cooper and David Estcourt, ‘Victoria to Hold First Judge-Only Trial, but Lawyers Favour Jury System’ (The Age, 5 July 2020). https://www.theage.com.au/national/victoria/victoria-to-hold-first-judge-only-trial-but-lawyers-favour-jury-system-20200705-p5594e.html. Accessed 6 July 2020.
